The Good Country with Madeline Hung 🗺

Dec 20, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • crises response
  • mexico
  • community organizing

We’re joined by Madeline Hung, Co-Founder of The Good Country an effort to create a digital country based on shared values. We’ll engage in a conversation about how their mission, values, and how the organization operates.
